SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
LineIter
LineIter is the class that outputs the given string line by line.
Term
Term is the class that provides static methods to get the informations about the terminal.
Term.Size
Size is the record class which represents a terminzal size holding its column count and row count.
Unicode
Unicode is the class that provides static methods to operate or check Unicode characters or texts.
